content.rendered:
How do you take some of Europe’s most vulnerable and controversial groups and turn them into an unquestionable boost for the economy?

Well, if you’re the clever people behind PLACE, you take people touched by the migrant crisis, and put them into innovation labs to give them every chance to turn their best ideas into start-ups.

I was very happy to help out with some mentoring and to write, shoot, and edit this promo video for them. All done on a bro-bono basis.

It was used to give a snapshot of the labs to find corporate and governmental partners – and on social to give people a quick overview.

//A 🌍
